title: Tadej Pogačar Extends with UAE Team Emirates in Blockbuster 6-Year Deal
content:
The long-term contract extension ends when he's 32 and will make him the best-paid rider in the peloton: 'We have watched him blossom.'

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Extends with UAE Team Emirates in Blockbuster 6-Year Deal on Velo.
author: ahood
